name: Interactive Ball Guy - Pokemon Sword and Shield Fan Game
name_original: Interactive Ball Guy - Pokemon Sword and Shield Fan Game
description:
I'm excited to show you guys a small little weekend thing I made! Ball Guy from Pokemon Sword/Shield was a really interesting character that randomly follows you around the different Pokemon Centers (and gives you free Pokeballs) and I wanted to make an homage to him in INTERACTIVE BALL GUY - THE GAME. 

Warning: Some flashing images + horror. 

Gameplay: Click to get balls! 

Time: 3.5 hours 
Tool: Animate CC 

Let me know what you think!
